Package entity

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • entity.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Admin, Student
    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a user that can access the STARS Application A user can be either an admin or student in the application
    Since:
    2020/10/08
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lim Bing Hong, Jasper
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
